'''Celine''' is [[Dan Friesen|Dan's]] cat and the true leader of [[Knowledge Fight]].

Celine has made several cameo appearances on the podcast, but is perhaps most notable for the works she has inspired in others.

*Dan and [[Jordan Holmes|Jordan]] frequently reference the "Cult of Celine".
*Many listeners have made "adoption" donations to help protect endangered animals in the name of Celine.
*[[Owen Shroyer]] directly discussed Dan's love for Celine after she was mentioned in a NYT article about Knowledge Fight<ref>https://www.nytimes.com/2021/04/18/us/politics/alex-jones.html</ref>.
